lead_paragraph: Arkansas will ask the N.C.A.A. to allow the transfer quarterback Ryan Mallett to play immediately for the Razorbacks without sitting out a year. Mallett transferred from Michigan after Rich Rodriguez replaced the retiring coach Lloyd Carr. Mallett has three years of eligibility remaining.
